data.text: Due, ɔdesɛefo,
Ao Awurade, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ;
Aman no te wo nne mmubomu a, woguan;
Wɔtase mo asade, Ao amanaman, sɛnea mmoadabimma yɛ;
Wɔama Awurade so, na ɔte ɔsorosoro;
Ɔbɛyɛ fapem a atim yiye wɔ mo mmere so,
Monhwɛ, wɔn mmarima akokodurufo su teɛteɛɛ mu wɔ mmɔnten so;
Atempɔn no so da hɔ kwa,
Asase no wo kesee na ɛsɛe,
“Afei na mɛsɔre,” sɛɛ na Awurade se.
Munyinsɛn ntɛtɛ,
Wɔbɛhyew aman no ama wɔatɔ nso;
Mo a mowɔ akyirikyiri no, muntie nea mayɛ;
Nnebɔneyɛfo a wɔwɔ Sion abɔ huboa;
Nea ɔnantew trenee mu
saa onipa yi na ɔbɛtena ɔsorosoro hɔ,
Mo ani behu ɔhene no wɔ nʼanuonyam mu
Mo adwennwen mu, mobɛbooboo nea na ohunahuna mo no ho:
Morenhu saa ahantanfo no bio,
Monhwɛ Sion, yɛn afahyɛ kuropɔn no;
Ɛhɔ na Awurade bɛyɛ yɛn Tumfo.
Na Awurade ne yɛn temmufo,
Wo ntampehama mu agow
Obiara nni Sion a ɔbɛka se, “Meyare;”
